oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Acknowledgement from office of Commissary General of Subsistence
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wainwright, William Alonzo, 1832-1904; United States -- Army -- Indiana Volunteer Infantry, 75th; United States -- Army -- Subsistence Dept.; Taylor, Joseph Pannell, 1796-1864; Armies -- Commissariat; Tennessee -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Acknowledgement from Office of Commissary General of Subsistence to Lieutenant William Wainwright, 75th Regiment Indiana Volunteers, Chattanooga, Tennessee, that his Returns of Commissary Property for July, August, September, October, and November are being sent to the Third Auditor of the Treasury and signed by Commissioner General of Subsistence J. P. Taylor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States -- Army -- Subsistence Dept.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: William Alonzo Wainwright, United States Assistant Quartermaster Records, 1861-1870
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Note that this Civil War paperwork had passed through the Third Auditor of the Treasury as it was being thoroughly monitored and re-checked.
